001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.Iterator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Map.Entry;
008
009import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions;
010import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
011import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
012import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.Constructor;
013import org.yaml.snakeyaml.nodes.MappingNode;
014import org.yaml.snakeyaml.nodes.NodeTuple;
015import org.yaml.snakeyaml.nodes.ScalarNode;
016import org.yaml.snakeyaml.nodes.SequenceNode;
017import org.yaml.snakeyaml.representer.Representer;
018import org.yaml.snakeyaml.resolver.Resolver;
019
020/**
021 * Snake YAML {@link Constructor} which creates {@link MarkedArrayList} and {@link MarkedLinkedHashMap} which allows to obtain locations of of elements in the source file using {@link Marker}s.
022 * @author Pavel Vlasov
023 *
024 */
025public class MarkingYamlConstructor extends Constructor {
026        
027        private String location;
028
029        public MarkingYamlConstructor(LoaderOptions loadingConfig, String location) {
030                super(loadingConfig);
031                this.location = location;
032        }
033        
034        @Override
035        protected List<? extends Object> constructSequence(SequenceNode node) {
036                MarkedArrayList<? extends Object> ret = (MarkedArrayList<? extends Object>) super.constructSequence(node);
037                node.getValue().forEach(n -> ret.getElementMarkers().add(Collections.singletonList(new MarkerImpl(location, n.getStartMark()))));
038                Iterator<? extends Object> eit = ret.iterator();
039                Iterator<List<? extends Marker>> mit = ret.getElementMarkers().iterator();
040                while (eit.hasNext() && mit.hasNext()) {
041                        Object e = eit.next();
042                        List<? extends Marker> ml = mit.next();
043                        if (e instanceof Markable) {
044                                ((Markable) e).mark(ml);
045                        }
046                }
047                return ret;
048        }
049        
050        @Override
051        protected List<Object> newList(SequenceNode node) {
052                return new MarkedArrayList<Object>();
053        }
054                                
055        @Override
056        protected Map<Object, Object> constructMapping(MappingNode node) {
057                MarkedLinkedHashMap<Object, Object> ret = (MarkedLinkedHashMap<Object, Object>) super.constructMapping(node);
058                node.getValue()
059                        .stream()
060                        .map(NodeTuple::getKeyNode)
061                        .filter(n -> n instanceof ScalarNode)
062                        .forEach(keyNode -> ret.markEntry(((ScalarNode) keyNode).getValue(), new MarkerImpl(location, keyNode.getStartMark())));
063                
064                for (Entry<Object, Object> e: ret.entrySet()) {
065                        if (e.getValue() instanceof Markable) {
066                                ((Markable) e.getValue()).mark(ret.getEntryMarkers(e.getKey()));
067                        }
068                }
069                return ret;
070        }
071        
072        @Override
073        protected Map<Object, Object> newMap(MappingNode node) {
074                return new MarkedLinkedHashMap<Object, Object>();
075        }                                       
076                
077        /**
078         * @return Yaml which uses this {@link MarkingYamlConstructor} to create collections with markers.
079         */
080        public static Yaml createMarkingYaml(String location) {
081                LoaderOptions loaderOptions = new LoaderOptions();
082                loaderOptions.setAllowDuplicateKeys(false);
083                DumperOptions dumperOptions = new DumperOptions();
084                return new Yaml(new MarkingYamlConstructor(loaderOptions, location), new Representer(dumperOptions), dumperOptions, loaderOptions, new Resolver());
085        }
086
087}
